name: A Symphony Of Light And Sound
name_original: A Symphony Of Light And Sound
description:
This game is a little puzzle game with cubes, sound and light. I wanted to do something pretty with lights and create a mysterious atmosphere with music but turned out that i'm not a great artist and a complete beginner in music and sound design. Sooo the result is not what i had in mind but i learned many things so its cool. I will try to update it, add more levels and mechanics.

Have fun !

PS : There is still some minor issues on the coloration of a block, and other things. For now, you have to play the game with a controller. Might add keyboard support in futur update.
